mapper.insert: insert into drug_domestic_name (id, gmt_create, gmt_modify, is_deleted, my_id, approval_number, approval_number_remark, product_name_cn, product_name_en, commodity_name, product_unit, dosage, specifications, product_type, approval_time, original_approval_number, drug_standard_code, drug_standard_code_remark, product_addr, related_database ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{myId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{approvalNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{approvalNumberRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productNameCn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productNameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commodityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dosage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{specifications,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{approvalTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{originalApprovalNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drugStandardCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drugStandardCodeRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{relatedDatabase,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update drug_domestic_name set gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modify = #{gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, my_id = #{myId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, approval_number = #{approvalNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, approval_number_remark = #{approvalNumberRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_name_cn = #{productNameCn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_name_en = #{productNameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, commodity_name = #{commodityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_unit = #{productUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dosage = #{dosage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, specifications = #{specifications,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_type = #{productType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, approval_time = #{approvalTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, original_approval_number = #{originalApprovalNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, drug_standard_code = #{drugStandardCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, drug_standard_code_remark = #{drugStandardCodeRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_addr = #{productAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, related_database = #{relatedDatabase,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, gmt_create, gmt_modify, is_deleted, my_id, approval_number, approval_number_remark, product_name_cn, product_name_en, commodity_name, product_unit, dosage, specifications, product_type, approval_time, original_approval_number, drug_standard_code, drug_standard_code_remark, product_addr, related_database from drug_domestic_name where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
